-- | Bindings to Sophia library
--   
--   Bindings to <a>sophia</a>, an open source, modern, fast key/value
--   store.
@package sophia
@version 0.1.1

module Database.Sophia
withEnv :: (Env -> IO a) -> IO a
data CreateEnvFailed
CreateEnvFailed :: CreateEnvFailed
data SetKeyComparisonFailed
SetKeyComparisonFailed :: String -> SetKeyComparisonFailed
data Env
data IOMode
ReadOnly :: IOMode
ReadWrite :: IOMode
data AllowCreation
AllowCreation :: AllowCreation
DisallowCreation :: AllowCreation
openDir :: Env -> IOMode -> AllowCreation -> FilePath -> IO ()
data OpenDirFailed
OpenDirFailed :: String -> OpenDirFailed
withDb :: Env -> (Db -> IO a) -> IO a
data OpenDbFailed
OpenDbFailed :: String -> OpenDbFailed
data Db
hasValue :: Db -> ByteString -> IO Bool
data HasValueFailed
HasValueFailed :: String -> HasValueFailed
getValue :: Db -> ByteString -> IO (Maybe ByteString)
data GetValueFailed
GetValueFailed :: String -> GetValueFailed
setValue :: Db -> ByteString -> ByteString -> IO ()
data SetValueFailed
SetValueFailed :: String -> SetValueFailed
delValue :: Db -> ByteString -> IO ()
data DelValueFailed
DelValueFailed :: String -> DelValueFailed
data Order
GT :: Order
GTE :: Order
LT :: Order
LTE :: Order
withCursor :: Db -> Order -> ByteString -> (Cursor -> IO a) -> IO a
data CreateCursorFailed
CreateCursorFailed :: String -> CreateCursorFailed
data Cursor
fetchCursor :: Cursor -> IO Bool
data FetchCursorFailed
FetchCursorFailed :: FetchCursorFailed
keyAtCursor :: Cursor -> IO ByteString
valAtCursor :: Cursor -> IO ByteString
data AtCursorFailed
AtCursorFailed :: AtCursorFailed
fetchCursorAll :: Cursor -> IO [(ByteString, ByteString)]
instance Typeable CreateEnvFailed
instance Typeable SetKeyComparisonFailed
instance Typeable OpenDirFailed
instance Typeable OpenDbFailed
instance Typeable HasValueFailed
instance Typeable GetValueFailed
instance Typeable SetValueFailed
instance Typeable DelValueFailed
instance Typeable CreateCursorFailed
